title: stuck at logging in after maintenance
body: i have yet to be able to log in this morning since maintenance and get stuck at logging on for a minuet or so before i get an unable to connect to pvp.net message and was wondering if anybody else is having this issue

replies.body: We're going to reach out to Century Link, it is routing to the new endpoint as expected but the login request still isn't making it all the way through possibly something on their end.  I'll try to keep you updated with progress but in the meantime you might try a vpn if you have one, and we'll continue to work on what we can from our side.
This is still a problem for me as well, been trying to log in all day. Re-installed, usual fixes, etc. I also have Century Link in KS.
Hey, it just so happens that I submitted a support ticket. My ISP is Century Link in Burns, Oregon. Is there any chance that there's some kind of duplicate issue here?

Hey all, can you try loggin in now? 

We were testing with a few players on discord and are now able to log in!
If ya don't mind me asking, what was the root of the problem?

> [{quoted}](name=Daedälus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=004a0003,timestamp=2016-08-04T22:15:11.118+0000)
>
> If ya don't mind me asking, what was the root of the problem?

All I can really say is that it was a bad piece of hardware on our side so CL just happened to be the one running through that equipment.

Wanted to say thanks and in the world of networking I am impressed very often these things are never spoken of among companies. Coming out verbally and attending the situation is really impressive given all I see being covered up learning in class It's real easy to sweep thing's under the rug.(Comptia Network student)
Well i'm glad that you were able to find the root of the problem xD thank you for all your hard work!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRival,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=004a,timestamp=2016-08-04T21:49:56.853+0000)
>
> Hey all, can you try loggin in now? 
> 
> We were testing with a few players on discord and are now able to log in!

Sadly Im still unable to log in it seems.
Logged in just fine. Thank You!
It works!!!!! FeelsAmazingMan. Ty for fixing this for us. :D
YAY!!! You guys got it Thank you to everyone on the team working diligently on this for us, i know we are a small portion of the playerbase but thank you so much!
IT WORKKKKKKS THANK YOU SO MUCH
Really appreciate all the work you've done, ty sm!
Thanks for trying guys, we're on the phone with Century Link to try and get this resolved.
No thank you for communicating with us instead of leaving us in the dark.
Century Link in Texas. Same problem, still can't log in.
Same thing here for me and all my friends since they own our little town as the only ISP.
Yeah its literally the only ones that provide in my neck of the boonies
Luckily theres a rumor that AT&T and a few other companies are moving into our area so the Tyrant that is Centurylink will come to an end. Im lucky if I get 4mb download speed for 106$* a month.

> [{quoted}](name=APMountainDrew,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=0008000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-03T17:46:41.620+0000)
>
> Luckily theres a rumor that AT&T and a few other companies are moving into our area so the Tyrant that is Centurylink will come to an end. Im lucky if I get 4mb download speed for 40$ or so a month.

Here's hoping, always painful when you have only have one choice.  Even if that choice happens to be good, competition breeds innovation.
Same here.  Small town in KS.

> [{quoted}](name=Sartec,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-08-03T17:08:37.293+0000)
>
> Century Link in Texas. Same problem, still can't log in.

Are you able to trace to 192.64.174.65 as well?  Looks like we fixed the Iowa issue but TX still showing problems.  Same for APMountainDrew.  If you guys could post your traces, we'll see what we can figure out over here.
Century Link has opened a repair ticket from our request, no word yet on what seems to be the issue from their side.

> [{quoted}](name=RiotWulalowe,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-08-03T21:59:17.221+0000)
>
> Century Link has opened a repair ticket from our request, no word yet on what seems to be the issue from their side.

I understand there is a reason League wont connect through Century Link, however Im able to play any other game online, so it isn't entirely Century Link. Maybe something on your end that is interfering with Century Link. Im just afraid that they will never  get around to it, and our days of playing League will be over, unless RIOT does something. As you can see from other comments on here, CL is notorious for not giving a crap about getting around to fixing anything!  *Worried in KS.

> [{quoted}](name=Drain Bamage,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=00130000,timestamp=2016-08-03T22:23:02.675+0000)
>
> I understand there is a reason League wont connect through Century Link, however Im able to play any other game online, so it isn't entirely Century Link. Maybe something on your end that is interfering with Century Link. Im just afraid that they will never  get around to it, and our days of playing League will be over, unless RIOT does something. As you can see from other comments on here, CL is notorious for not giving a crap about getting around to fixing anything!  *Worried in KS.

We're continuing to investigate on our side as well, we're not completely leaving this in their hands and as you said it entirely could be a case of issues from both sides.
Made another change just now, please give it a try and let me know if it helped any.

The network team isn't in the office yet so I haven't gotten a chance to see if the maintenance that they were supposed to have completed was done last night.  Nevertheless if it's still not working, I'll make sure they continue to work on it today when they get in.
Those of you still having issues, can you try telnet 192.64.174.65 2099 from command prompt and let me know if it fails or connects?  Also let me know if ping 192.64.174.65 times out or succeeds.
What do you mean "telnet 192.64.174.65 2099"? And I pinged 192.64.174.65 and it times out.

> [{quoted}](name=Daedälus,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=00160002,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:35:33.369+0000)
>
> What do you mean "telnet 192.64.174.65 2099"? And I pinged 192.64.174.65 and it times out.

oops sorry forgot that windows doesnt have native telnet from command window, darnit.
ahh ok so is there something else we can do?

I talked with one of our engineers and it looks like one of our POPs is having issues.  We're in the process of dropping that endpoint which should force you guys onto a different POP, hold tight and should be fixed in a few mins.
Thanks guys, network dudes checking the routes again.  Thanks for your patience with all this.

any luck?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Nope, getting the exact same error. Didn't fix. Can't get in.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

> [{quoted}](name=EdibleTaco,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=002f0000,timestamp=2016-08-04T17:54:09.376+0000)
>
> Nope, getting the exact same error. Didn't fix. Can't get in.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Can you do a tracert to 192.64.174.65 and post the new output?
Still no access for me, centurylink in the Houston area.

Okay last update for a bit, we have a plan to do a maintenance after midnight PST that we're hopeful will help.  We can't do it now unfortunately because the number of online players it would affect would be too great, and things of this nature need to be done during normal maintenance hours.  Sorry that we couldn't get this fixed up sooner and no real guarantees this will fix it either, so far we and Century Link haven't been able to find the smoking gun as to the cause.
yeah having the same problem guess ill try back at it in awhile also stuck with centurylink, the hardships of living in the middle of no where texas
Im in east texas, Log Cabin City to be specific, if you can find a smaller "city" I wanna see it
Rofl. I'm in Mabank, and I'm getting the same issues. Have been since this morning.

> [{quoted}](name=Calico D Jak,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=B2VFcQKX,comment-id=001000000000,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:42:47.292+0000)
>
> Rofl. I'm in Mabank, and I'm getting the same issues. Have been since this morning.

wat i live in payne springs
There seems to be a few of us in the surrounding area then lol. As far as I can tell, there are 3 or 4 of us from the Cedar Creek Lake area, and we're all having the same problems.
Let's blame Hillary Clinton... The E-Mails were actually to mess with the Century Link customers, specifically the League of Legends players in Texas and Kansas.
I'm glad she's not getting my vote. I could never vote someone that would take away precious League time from me. Rofl.
Haha! Perfect reasoning.
Century Link in Texas i still can not log in either....
What ISP and state are you trying to login from?  We're trying to narrow this down at the moment.
Kansas Here Century Link ISP, stuck at logging in, same as everyone else who has Century link it seems
